analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x0475cad90f0e134969aecd27dfdc8c02b6ec0026.sol:
	Contract Reoncoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x0475cad90f0e134969aecd27dfdc8c02b6ec0026.sol#271-279)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
